description: Fermentful is a Latvian foodtech startup that develops and produces fermented plant-based probiotic drinks made from organic green buckwheat. Their products are designed to support gut health and overall wellbeing, offering a clean-label, dairy-free alternative to traditional kefir drinks.
key_products_services: Fermented plant-based kefir drinks (Natural, Apple-Lingonberry, Sea Buckthorn, Dark Chocolate)
business_model: Fermentful sells its products through retail partners, direct-to-consumer via subscriptions, and exports to international markets. The company focuses on B2C sales of packaged functional beverages and snacks.
target_customer: Health-conscious consumers, individuals with food intolerances (gluten, dairy, soy), vegans, vegetarians, and those seeking gut health and functional nutrition solutions.

key_metrics.Retail Presence: Available in 100+ stores in Austria (Billa/REWE Group) and Baltic region

mission_statement: We believe in food as medicine, where prevention and targeted nutrition approaches can contribute to better mental and physical health, as well as planetary health. Our goal is to create delicious, convenient, and science-backed fermented plant-based products that support daily gut health and overall wellbeing.
